description:
Ruby Client for Cloud Bigtable Admin API (Alpha)

Cloud Bigtable Admin API:

  • Product Documentation

Quick Start

In order to use this library, you first need to go through the following steps:

  1. Select or create a Cloud Platform project.
  2. Enable billing for your project.
  3. Enable the Cloud Bigtable Admin API.
  4. Setup Authentication.

Installation

$ gem install google-cloud-bigtable-admin

Next Steps

  • Read the Cloud Bigtable Admin API Product documentation to learn more about the product and see How-to Guides.
